Name: Saint Maribel
About the game: Evolution of Metroidvania-style action RPG The dungeon consists of a battle stage where you fight against enemies, a rest stage with Alchemi and Tanya, and a stage with hidden treasure chests. Defeat enemies, collect mana, and acquire powerful skills and abilities. A powerful magic tool by magic craft. Have Alchemi make a potion and level up. Let's challenge strong enemies! Character makeup Including the color change pattern of one costume, the body shape change is also the largest ever. You can introduce the concept of accessories and create more unique characters. This feature will be added more and more in updates( When buy, this is disabled
